name: Anthea
bio: I hope that this club can be a community for fun and growth of its members. Hobbies: I love coffee for its taste and would be down for a quick coffee chat if my week isn't packed. I also fancy rock climbing, but have recently been running for the health of my body and wallet.

name: Marsiah
bio:
Hi! I’m Marsiah, a junior Molecular & Cell Biology major on the pre-med track and an out-of-state student who’s grown to really love Berkeley. I’m very outgoing, love meeting new people, and will always say yes to a good conversation.

Outside of classes, I’m usually volunteering, helping plan events, or finding ways to stay involved around campus. I recently got back into reading, love Pilates, and am always down for anything social or community-oriented.
